description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play the new co-op or single player mode as Chicky &/or Ducky in this new fantastic HD game based on an all time classic… Collect a super feather and power up to turn the tables on the enemy kitty! Become “Super Chicky” or “Angry Ducky”!  Features Jump-in and Jump-out Co-op play! “Harvest Fun in Chick Chick Chicky”
description.short: Play the new co-op or single player mode as Chicky &/or Ducky in this new fantastic HD game based on an all time classic… Collect a super feather and power up to turn the tables on the enemy kitty!
